channel.title: 508 hd client
channel.description:
hi, what have i done wrong i have i have gone to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=433322.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=433322.0[/url] change the loader.java (thanks runemake) and the ip and installed the cache. followed the tut perfectly i think up to jav i dont want the webclient stuff YET.
but when i run the bat it works till it stop in the loading fase connecting to update server and stops there. Now it is connecting to my server as my server say the ip has connected.
then after a few second the screen goes white and i get an error in my dos saying error_game_js5io :( thanks for you time ps it look well good!!!!
you dont have to get this on to work i just need a 508 hd client that works :)
[b]thanks you all very much for your help!!!!!!!![/b]

item.title: 508 hd client
item.dc:creator: @motters motters
item.description:
@motters wrote:

hi,
what have i done wrong i have
i have gone to
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=433322.0
change the loader.java (thanks runemake) and the ip and installed the cache.
followed the tut perfectly i think up to jav i dont want the webclient stuff YET.

but when i run the bat it works till it stop in the loading fase
connecting to update server
and stops there.
Now it is connecting to my server as my server say the ip has connected.

then after a few second the screen goes white and i get an error in my dos saying error_game_js5io
thanks for you time
ps
it look well good!!!

you dont have to get this on to work i just need a 508 hd client that works

thanks you all very much for your help!!!
